name: Competition of NEW GUNDAM -RED or WHITE-
summary:
The Gundam Front Tokyo store and museum on Tokyo's artificial island of Odaiba will screen a new Gundam video short titled "Competition of NEW GUNDAM -RED or WHITE-" in the museum's "Dome-G" zone starting on November 7. The "Dome-G" zone features a dome 16 meters (about 52 feet) in diameter that is used to project Gundam-related videos.
本片于台场高达博物馆放送，继2001ガンダム新体験 グリーンダイバーズ后的幻之环幕电影，Delta Gundam二号机与Gundam3号机(初期检证型)首次登场。
info:
• 中文名: 新高达之竞争-红白-
  • 上映年度: 2015
  • 动画制作: サンライズ

relations.title: ガンダム新体験 -0087- グリーンダイバーズ
